title: GPT-4o Launch
description: OpenAI launches GPT-4o ('o' for 'omni'), integrating text and images in a single model, marking a significant advancement in multimodal AI capabilities.

title: GPT-4o mini Release
description: OpenAI introduces GPT-4o mini, offering improved performance over GPT-3.5 Turbo at a lower cost, with a 128K context window and enhanced multilingual capabilities.

title: o1 and o1-mini Release
description: OpenAI releases o1 and o1-mini, new large language models trained with reinforcement learning to perform complex reasoning tasks.

title: Sora Video Generation Model
description: OpenAI introduces Sora, a video generation model that can create high-quality videos from text prompts.

title: 12 Days of OpenAI
description: OpenAI launches '12 Days of Shipmas', a daily announcement event featuring new AI features and tools, including the introduction of ChatGPT Pro and Sora video generation model.

title: o3 and o3-mini Preview
description: OpenAI previews o3 and o3-mini models, successors to the o1 series, claiming significant advancements in AI reasoning and interaction, with public launch expected in early 2025.

title: Claude 3 Family Release
description: Anthropic announces the Claude 3 model family, setting new industry benchmarks across a wide range of cognitive tasks, including Haiku, Sonnet, and Opus variants.

title: Claude 3.5 Haiku and Sonnet Release
description: Anthropic releases Claude 3.5 Haiku, its fastest model yet, and an improved version of Claude 3.5 Sonnet, along with a new computer use feature for Sonnet.

title: AI-Powered Cancer Detection System
description: FDA approves an AI system for early-stage cancer detection, showing significantly higher accuracy rates than traditional methods.

title: AI Traffic Management System
description: Singapore implements citywide AI traffic management system, reducing congestion by 30% in pilot areas.

title: AI-Enhanced Weather Forecasting
description: NOAA deploys new AI-powered weather prediction system, improving forecast accuracy by up to 40% for extreme weather events.

title: Constitutional AI Framework
description: Researchers publish comprehensive framework for implementing ethical constraints in large language models, introducing new methods for value alignment.

title: Neural Architecture Evolution
description: Breakthrough paper demonstrates self-evolving neural networks that can automatically optimize their architecture for specific tasks.

title: Quantum-Classical AI Integration
description: Research team achieves first successful integration of quantum computing with classical AI models, showing significant speed improvements for specific tasks.

title: GSA AI Framework
description: General Services Administration finalizes and issues framework for prioritizing critical emerging technologies, including generative AI capabilities, in a secure cloud environment.

title: EU AI Act Enters into Force
description: European Union enacts the AI Act (Regulation (EU) 2024/1689), the first-ever comprehensive legal framework on AI, addressing risks and setting requirements for AI developers and deployers.

title: OMB AI Acquisition Policy
description: Office of Management and Budget releases M-24-18, a government-wide policy to advance responsible acquisition of AI by Federal agencies.

title: Major Tech Company Layoffs
description: Several major tech companies announce significant layoffs despite AI boom, raising questions about industry direction.

title: AI Alliance Formation
description: Leading tech companies form alliance to establish standards for responsible AI development and deployment.

title: AI Copyright Lawsuit
description: Landmark copyright lawsuit filed against AI companies over training data usage, setting potential precedent for industry.

title: NeurIPS 2024
description: Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems, featuring breakthrough research in machine learning and artificial intelligence.
